author: jdillon
msg: Tidy up deployment plugin post application of GERONIMO-1738
Using plexus-utils CommandLine to handle launching Java
Cleaned up logging, using MojoSupport to deal with exceptions
Using more specific field types so that Maven will set File's instead of converting Strings to files
Pending testing and resolution of custom logging bits which were mostly removed
